Methods  

getGameInfoToday ( )

gameinfo.t[100]

Get today’s date as a string in the format YYYY-MM-DD. This can be used as a simple way of keeping the release date in the game information up to date with the latest compilation.

writeGameInfo (tab, fname)

gameinfo.t[77]

Write the game information from the given LookupTable to the given file. Each key/value pair in the LookupTable gives the GameInfo key and the corresponding value string for that key. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
